creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: seated woman in heavy drapery holding a standing child on her lap looking to the viewer's left toward a seated man in a toga and a standing nude boy; a male figure stands behind her and a woman in heavy drapery is seated to the central figure's left
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, with white heightening, traces of graphite on laid paper laid down on board
title: Holy Family with Saint Elizabeth, Saint Zacharias, and Saint John the Baptist in an Interior
